mapper.select: SELECT C.CLASS_NO,C.KINDER_NO,C.CLASS_NAME FROM KINDER_CLASS C JOIN USERS U ON U.USER_NO = C.TEACHER_NO WHERE U.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND SUBSTR(OPENED_DATE,1,2) = SUBSTR(SYSDATE,1,2)
SELECT CHILDREN_NO FROM CHILDREN C JOIN USERS U ON U.USER_NO = C.USER_NO WHERE U.USER_NO = #{userNo}

SELECT C.CLASS_NO,C.TEACHER_NO FROM KINDER_CLASS C WHERE (KINDER_NO,CLASS_NAME,OPENED_DATE) IN (SELECT K.KINDER_NO, K.CLASS_NAME,K.OPENED_DATE FROM KINDER_CLASS K WHERE K.CHILDREN_NO =(SELECT C.CHILDREN_NO FROM CHILDREN C JOIN USERS U ON U.USER_NO = C.USER_NO WHERE U.USER_NO = #{userNo})) AND C.DIVISION = '선생님'
SELECT C.CLASS_NO,C.KINDER_NO,C.CLASS_NAME FROM KINDER_CLASS C JOIN USERS U ON U.USER_NO = C.CHILDREN_NO WHERE U.USER_NO = #{selectNum} AND SUBSTR(OPENED_DATE,1,2) = SUBSTR(SYSDATE,1,2)
SELECT C.CLASS_NO,C.KINDER_NO,C.CLASS_NAME FROM KINDER_CLASS C JOIN USERS U ON U.USER_NO = C.CHILDREN_NO WHERE U.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND SUBSTR(OPENED_DATE,1,2) = SUBSTR(SYSDATE,1,2)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD B WHERE STATUS='N' AND KINDER_NO = #{kinderNum} AND BOARD_TYPE = '공지사항' AND CLASS_NO IS NULL OR CLASS_NO = #{classNum}
SELECT * FROM BOARD B JOIN KINDER_CLASS K ON (B.WRITER = K.TEACHER_NO) LEFT JOIN BOARD_COMMENT C ON (B.BOARD_NO = C.BOARD_NO) WHERE B.BOARD_NO = #{bid} AND B.STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY COMMENT_NO DESC
